name: Valley of the Risen
description:
Sennin and Senka spent years researching for magecraft to extend their life. They decided to put their research into practice, so they headed to a temple on the summit of Yoshino Mountain called Oku-Senbon to perform their ritual.  However,  things went wrong. The temple began to collapse, and both of them were buried.  Yoshino Mountain quickly became full of zombies. Mage Slayer Corps, an international organization to protect humanity from the practitioners of magecraft, learned about the situation and decided that Yoshino Mountain could be a perfect place for holding a final entrance exam for people seeking to become a member of Mage Slayer Corps.

Kokei, who wanted to serve the Mage Slayer Corps, entered the final entrance exam. 

Kokei had to dodge, survive from chasing by the zombies, and get to the church in order to pass the entrance exam.

With limited bullets, help Kokei survive, shoot the zombies, and get to the church!!

Try to run away from the zombies!

                

Basic Controls

Press "WASD" or arrows to move

Mouse click to shoot

Press "Shift" to sprint
